thread:
The new dataset DAILYDILEMMAS explores LLM value prioritization in everyday moral choices. 🧠⚖️ #AIResearch #MoralAI
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2410.02683
Drum roll 🥁 New AI dataset maps 301 human values across five frameworks. #AIResearch #ValuesMapping
Drfeifei's analysis shows LLMs like GPT-4-turbo and Claude-3-Haiku often clash with their stated values, prioritizing self-expression over survival, fairness, and safety. 🔍🚨 #AIEthics #LLMValues
The study shows generated dilemmas match real-world moral intuitions 🧠🧠 #AIResearch #MoralDilemmas
